reviewText: Did not know most of the facts about these ships and there valiant career s
The survivor interviews really touched me. It brought a sense of humanity to history. A great video for those who remember the war. A great history video for those of us who were born after the war.

VERY INFORMATIVE.  THE FLOW OF THE VIDEO WAS GREAT AND THE PICTURES WERE FANTASTIC.  I NEVER LEARNED THAT MUCH IN MY HISTORY CLASS IN SCHOOL. VERY EDUCATIONAL.  WELL, PUT TOGETHER AND VERY INTERESTING. UNBELIEVABLE.  WATCH IT!
